Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #4# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Wallet#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
